001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.UUID;
005
006import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.CorrelationIdProvider;
007
008/**
009 * {@link CorrelationIdProvider} which adds the project key as prefix
010 */
011public class ApiCorrelationIdProvider implements CorrelationIdProvider {
012    private final String projectKey;
013
014    public ApiCorrelationIdProvider(String projectKey) {
015        this.projectKey = projectKey;
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public String getCorrelationId() {
020        return projectKey + "/" + UUID.randomUUID();
021    }
022}
